name: Trying
description:
Trying is a game about feeling. You play as... You. Trying to find the girl who cursed you 5 years ago, and took away your ability to be happy. Along the way you help some people, and make some friends. Made with rpg maker 2003!

Play time is about an hour.

Special thanks to those who playtested, including Shawn, Skyler Badalament-Tirrell, and Alisa!
